ca.athabascau.sccori.data
Class SimulationInfo

java.lang.Object
  ca.athabascau.sccori.data.SimulationInfo

public class SimulationInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This is a container object representing a simulation, and all of the event information that the agent has been shown so far.

Method Detail

copyValueFrom

public void copyValueFrom(SimulationInfo aSimulationInfo)
Copy the values from a Simulation Info into this Simulation info.

Parameters:
aSimulationInfo - the information to be used

addMessage

public void addMessage(Message aMessage)
Add a message to this Simulation Info. This message is comming from an other agent, and is added by the Facilator class MessageChannel.

See Also:
MessageChannel

nextMessage

public Message nextMessage()
Pop the next message which was recieved from the message stack. This follows a FIFO sequence.

Returns:
the next message, or null if there are no more messages.

getSimulationId

public int getSimulationId()
Retrieve the Simulation id for this simulation. This value is assigned by the SCCORI web site.

Returns:
the Simulation ID

setSimulationId

public void setSimulationId(int anId)

getAgentRole

public int getAgentRole()
Retrieve the agent role for this Simulation Information. This is the role of the agent which is using a Simulation to interface with a SCCORI simulation.

Returns:
the agent role

setAgentRole

public void setAgentRole(int theAgentRole)

setAgentRole

public void setAgentRole(java.lang.String anAgentRole)
Set the agent role.

Parameters:
anAgentRole - a string representing the agent role as displayed on the SCCORI web site.

getBackLogCost

public double getBackLogCost()

Retrieve the cost of back logs in the simulation.

The default SCCORI value for this is $1.

Returns:
the cost of back loged items

setBackLogCost

public void setBackLogCost(double theBackLogCost)

getCurrentCycleNumber

public int getCurrentCycleNumber()
Get the current cycle number in the SCCORI simulation.

Returns:
the current cycle number in the SCCORI simualtion.

getCurrentInventory

public int getCurrentInventory()

Retrieve the starting inventory.

The default SCCORI value for this is 40 items.

Parameters:
theCurrentInventory - the inventory at the begining of the game

public void setCurrentInventory(int theCurrentInventory)

getMaxInventory

public int getMaxInventory()

Retrieve the maximum inventory allowed by the simualtion.

The default SCCORI value for this is 100.

Returns:
the maximum-stock on hand allowed

setMaxInventory

public void setMaxInventory(int theMaxInventory)

getSafetyStock

public int getSafetyStock()

Retrieve the default number of items that each player should keep in their inventory.

The default SCCORI value for this is 40.

Returns:
the safety stock level for warning purposes

setSafetyStock

public void setSafetyStock(int theSafetyStock)

addTurnEvent

public void addTurnEvent(TurnEvent aTurnEvent)
Add a turn event to this information. TurnEvent represent a players turn. i.e. what ordered, and all the information available to them when their turn occured.

Parameters:
aTurnEvent - the latest TurnEvent

getCurrentTurnEvent

public TurnEvent getCurrentTurnEvent()
Retrieve the next TurnEvent. This TurnEvent may or may not have been executed. That is, its order may not have been placed yet.

Returns:
the last event to be added on the TurnEvent list.

getMyCurrentTurnInfo

public TurnInfo getMyCurrentTurnInfo()

Retrieve the TurnInformation belonging to the agent represented by this Information container.

Returns:
the TurnInfo for the agent owning this information container

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
SimualtionInfo are equal if they are for the same SCCORI simulation, and the same agent role.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
o - the SimulationInfo to be compared.
Returns:
true if same SCCORI simulation and same agent role

compareTo

public int compareTo(java.lang.Object o)
Parameters:
o - the SimulationInfo to be compared
Returns:
the difference between the two SCCORI simulation ids.
